title: Into The Wild movie Score by Michael Broook
description:
Into The Wild -- Golden Globe nomination/Score available!

Into The Wild ScoreWe are delighted to announce that Michael\\\\\\\&#039;s score -- with contributions from Kaki King and Eddie Vedder -- for the much-lauded Paramount Vantage movie \\\\\\\"Into the Wild\\\\\\\" (written and directed by Sean Penn) has been nominated by the Hollywood Foreign Press Association for a Golden Globe award for Best Score. The awards take place in Los Angeles on January 13, 2008. Michael\\\\\\\&#039;s powerful compositions for the film are available via Lakeshore Records and exclusively on Itunes.
